allow:
Bash(git commit -m "Initial commit: Indoor Navigation PoC with E57 to Nav2 converter and iOS apps using Nearby Interaction

- E57 to occupancy grid converter (PDAL and pye57 versions)
- Anchor placement tool for positioning base stations
- iOS Anchor app for UWB broadcasting stations
- iOS Navigator app with ARKit + Nearby Interaction fusion
- A* pathfinding on occupancy grids
- Complete documentation and setup guides")
